mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def second_most_frequent(arr):
    counter = Counter(arr)
    unique_arr = list(set(arr))
    sorted_unique_arr = sorted(unique_arr, key=lambda x: counter[x], reverse=True)
    return sorted_unique_arr[2]

    counter = Counter(arr)
    unique_arr = list(set(arr))
    sorted_unique_arr = sorted(unique_arr, key=lambda x: counter[x], reverse=True)
    return sorted_unique_arr[0]

from collections import Counter

def second_most_frequent(arr):
    counter = Counter(arr)
    unique_arr = list(set(arr))
    sorted_unique_arr = sorted(unique_arr, key=lambda x: counter[x], reverse=True)

mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def second_most_frequent(arr):
    counter = Counter(arr)
    unique_arr = list(set(arr))
    sorted_unique_arr = sorted(unique_arr, key=lambda x: counter[x], reverse=False)
    return sorted_unique_arr[1]
